# FOIL Engineering

> Product consulting, process design, and bespoke software development in Denver, CO.

## What We Do

FOIL Engineering builds solutions that fit your real constraints â€” team size, budget, legacy systems, niche workflows. Sometimes that's a custom tool. Sometimes it's teaching a team how to think about problems differently. Every engagement starts with your context.

## Services

- Product Management: Strategy, 0-1 product development, user research, roadmap planning, A/B testing, go-to-market strategy
- Service Design: Process architecture, agile transformation, AI workflow design, change management, operational documentation
- Bespoke Tooling: AI-native applications, internal tools and dashboards, workflow automation, agent integrations, API development, prototypes and MVPs

## Tech Stack

Python, FastAPI, Vue 3, Astro, SQL, Claude API, MCP integrations, RAG architecture

## Who

Founded by Watson Mulkey, 10+ years product management experience. Previously at Bookshop.org, Discovery Education (Sony, Whirlpool, IBM clients).
